original_text: God's prophet Isaiah says this: ‘The root of Jesse will arrive. He will come to rule the Gentiles. The Gentiles will trust him to save them.’ 15: See Isaiah 11:10. Jesse was King David's father. See God's prophet Isaiah says this: ‘The root of Jesse will arrive. He will come to rule the Gentiles. The Gentiles will trust him to save them.’ 15: See Isaiah 11:10. Jesse was King David's father. See God's prophet Isaiah says this: ‘The root of Jesse will arrive. He will come to rule the Gentiles. The Gentiles will trust him to save them.’ 15: See Isaiah 11:10. Jesse was King David's father. See God's prophet Isaiah says this:
korean_text: 또 이사야가 이르되 이새의 뿌리 곧 열방을 다스리기 위하여 일어나시는 이가 있으리니 열방이 그에게 소망을 두리라 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The root of Jesse will arrive.
He will come to rule the Gentiles.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이방인들을 다스리기 위해 올 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The Gentiles will trust him to save them.
sentences.korean_translation: 이방인들은 그들을 구원할 그를 믿을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: See God's prophet Isaiah says this:
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 선지자 이사야가 이렇게 말하는 것을 보십시오:
